comments.content:
There are 4 different fonts on this image. What I could say:  
- QUOTES: [Clarendon](http://web.archive.org/web/20140828211202/http:/www.myfonts.com/search/clarendon) Bold  
- DESIGN: [Helvetica Neue](http://web.archive.org/web/20140828211202/http:/www.myfonts.com/search/helvetica+neue) Ultra Light

Can any one ID This Font?  
Thanks in Advance for your help

sh4075, you need to start a new thread for a new ID question.
